title: I cant get out of the ready for battle screen
body: It says 0 on the timer so i should be able to play but the game wont begin

replies.body: awesome sauce, I got a lost in ranked because the game woudn't even show up the loading screen
If i close and reopen the client its fixed but its annoying
It didnt do that for me lol

I received a leave buster penalty of 20 minutes, counted as a lost on rank and made me lose my advancement game. please can you guys at riot fix this and at least remove the leave buster penalty from my account I just want to play the game.
same, I immediately took pics and opened a support ticket. this is bs. when do I ever get a bug that GIVES me LP?
I got the same thing as you and got leave buster and lost my rank
I'm at stuck at ''Game is still in progress''
Me too. My friends were in the lobby too and they said the same thing was happening to them so it isn't just my cpu.
Just happened to me too it says all my teamates left
yepp just happened to me ffs rito
same here but i was in normals draft

This happened to me and trying to end the process just lead to the client restarting and taking me right back to the stuck screen. I had to pull open the command prompt with admin privileges, find league using tasklist command, and then taskkill /f /im leagueclient.exe
Is this why ranked is down?
3 of my team currently stuck in loading screen, wtf???? please, loss prevented riot. This is bs.
Same here. If I closed the client it wont let me back into the game or search for a new one.
